items.sentence: Tom has developed a new system for learning English.
Tom has no recollection of how he got his black eye.
Tom has pitched his tent not too far from the river.
Tom helped Mary on the bus, and then got on himself.
Let\'s spread the map on the table and talk it over.
I wasn\'t the one who gave Tom Mary\'s phone number.
Are you sure there\'s nothing else I can do for you?
Are you sure there\'s nothing else I can do to help?
Are you sure you don\'t want me to buy you a ticket?
Tom doesn\'t want to do that and I don\'t blame him.
